3

A_Leaf River Cluster Development - SIP Panel Condominium Project

Market Assessment: This project has strong fundamentals with big market need. With proper
execution, it will be very successful and replicable. However, execution quality determines
everything.
Our Approach: Rather than traditional full development services (8-10% fees), we propose
focusing on the most critical execution components where our expertise adds the highest value.
Fee Structure:
● 2% milestone fee: $418K (on $20.9M development cost)
● 1% success bonus: $209K (on $20.9M development cost)
● Total NorthStar fees: $627K (3% of development costs)
Critical Support Components - 2% Milestone Fee (adder Consultants are not included in NSG
fee - owner approval in advance of engagement req.):
● Systems integration & provisional patent access
● Professional team assembly and contractor vetting
● Technical coordination and quality control
● Documentation & compliance support
● Project coordination and milestone management
Success Fee (1% at Closing): Justified given execution-critical nature and risk-sharing in project
success.
Owner Benefits: 32.7% net profit margin with professional execution support, replicable model
for future projects.

Development Approach
Sales & Marketing Strategy
● 3D printed site model in professional sales office
● Quality presentation materials
